Hey thanks for torrent, I know this sounds stupid, but will this work on a normal XBOX360 or do I have to buy a special one? What I mean is what is "modded"?

@padraic - a "modded" 360 means the dvd drive has been flashed with new firmware, i recommend having a friend or "service" provider do this if you are not a knowledgeable tech person, after that you must use abgx and imgburn to make this a useable game, the burning is fairly simple its flashing the 360 that is the tricky part
